verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
G
O hope of glory
our Christ will return
We will be raptured
with glory transformed
Glorified with Him
Himself to enjoy
In His full likeness
we then will be formed

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Glorious hope! Christ will return!
Glorious hope! Christ will return!
We will be raptured
with glory transformed
O hope of glory
our Christ will return!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
O hope of glory
our Christ will return!
The old creation will vanish away
No more we'll groan but have full liberty
Enjoy salvation
in its utmost way

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
O hope of glory
our Christ will return!
Over the nations
with Him we will reign
Priests we will be in His presence to serve
Thus His salvation
in fullness we'll gain

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
O hope of glory
our Christ will return!
Waiting and watching
we faithfully serve
Running the race
pressing on toward the goal
That we the Kingdom's
reward might deserve
